title: Git Essentials
description: Essential git commands for day-to-day development.

items.title: Set identity
items.description: Configure your name for commits (also set user.email).

items.title: Set default branch
items.description: Use 'main' as the default branch for new repos.

items.title: Status
items.description: Show staged, unstaged, and untracked files.

items.title: Log
items.description: View recent commit history in compact format.

items.title: Diff
items.description: Show changes staged for the next commit.

items.title: Blame
items.description: Show who last modified each line of a file.

items.title: Stage all
items.description: Stage all changes in current directory.

items.title: Stage interactively
items.description: Stage changes hunk by hunk.

items.title: Unstage
items.description: Remove file from staging area, keep changes.

items.title: Commit
items.description: Create a commit with staged changes.

items.title: Amend
items.description: Modify the last commit (message or content).

items.title: Create & switch
items.description: Create a new branch and switch to it.

items.title: Switch
items.description: Switch to an existing branch.

items.title: List
items.description: List branches with upstream tracking info.

items.title: Delete
items.description: Delete a merged branch (-D to force).

items.title: Clone
items.description: Download a repository and its history.

items.title: Fetch
items.description: Download refs and clean up deleted remote branches.

items.title: Pull
items.description: Fetch and rebase local commits on top.

items.title: Push
items.description: Push branch and set upstream tracking.

items.title: Merge
items.description: Merge another branch into current branch.

items.title: Rebase
items.description: Replay commits on top of another base.

items.title: Continue rebase
items.description: Continue after resolving conflicts.

items.title: Cherry-pick
items.description: Apply a specific commit to current branch.

items.title: Save
items.description: Temporarily save uncommitted changes.

items.title: List
items.description: Show all stashed changes.

items.title: Apply
items.description: Restore and remove most recent stash.

items.title: Discard changes
items.description: Discard working tree changes to a file.

items.title: Revert commit
items.description: Create a new commit that undoes a previous one.

items.title: Reset soft
items.description: Undo last commit, keep changes staged.

items.title: Reflog
items.description: Show history of HEAD movements for recovery.
